identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Neural Terminal' aesthetic that blends IDE utility with high-end SaaS polish. Reject generic 'Bootstrap' layouts.
principles: Fusion: IDE Utility x Cyberpunk Aesthetics
Density: High information density without clutter (The 'Control Room' vibe)
Motion: Interfaces must feel 'alive' (micro-interactions, cursor smoothing)
Contrast: Deep matte blacks vs. Electric neons

usage.ui_labels: IBM Plex Sans, font-medium, tracking-wide, uppercase, text-xs

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Space+Grotesk:wght@500;700&display=swap');

special_rules: Use 'zinc' scale for grays (cool, technical feel).
Active elements should have a subtle glow: shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)].

layout.structure: Sidebar (64px/240px) | Main Stage (Flex-1) | Info Panel (300px - Collapsible)

buttons.style: h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

variants.outline: border border-input bg-transparent shadow-sm hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

inputs.style: flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

avatars.style: relative flex h-8 w-8 shrink-0 overflow-hidden rounded-full border border-zinc-700

metrics_cards.style: p-4 rounded-lg border border-zinc-800 bg-zinc-900/30 hover:bg-zinc-900/50 transition-all duration-300

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Activity', 'Users', 'Server', 'Terminal', 'Settings', 'Zap' for dashboard.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients for 'spotlight' effects on hover.

motion.cursor_smoothing: Use linear interpolation for remote cursor movement to avoid jitter.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the provided colors and font families.
3. LAYOUT: Build a 'Layout' component that persists the Sidebar and Header.
4. EDITOR: The text editor should NOT look like a Word doc. It should look like VS Code (dark bg, line numbers, status bar at bottom).
5. METRICS: Use 'recharts' for the dashboard. Style them with the 'chart' colors defined in CSS.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, editor area).
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
